    Load hydrometric data off the EAs API

    hydroAPI.Rd

    Load hydrometric data off the EAs API

    hydroAPI(
  WISKI = NULL,
  Parameter = NULL,
  Period = NULL,
  Type = "instantaneous",
  datapoints = "standard",
  UAT = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    WISKI

    WISKI ID for gauge

    Parameter

    User dfined; 'flow', 'level', 'rain'

    Period

    User defined 900 == 15min, 86400 == daily

    Type

    Data type set as 'instantaneous', some sites will have different aggrogators applied

    datapoints

    Set to standard that pulls up to 100,000 rows. If 'all' will pull up to 2,000,000 rows. 'earliest' returns first datapoint

    UAT

    Set to FALSE, if TRUE will pull data from UAT environment

    Value

    Examples

    hydroAPI(WISKI = 'SX87U053')
#>    Parameter Period          Type
#>       <char>  <int>        <char>
#> 1:     level  86400           max
#> 2:      flow    900 instantaneous
#> 3:     level    900 instantaneous
#> 4:      flow  86400          mean
#> 5:     level  86400           min
#> 6:      flow  86400           min
#> 7:      flow  86400           max
hydroAPI(WISKI = 'SX87U053', UAT = TRUE)
#>    Parameter Period          Type
#>       <char>  <int>        <char>
#> 1:     level  86400       maximum
#> 2:      flow  86400       maximum
#> 3:     level  86400       minimum
#> 4:      flow  86400       minimum
#> 5:      flow    900 instantaneous
#> 6:      flow  86400          mean
#> 7:     level    900 instantaneous

hydroAPI(WISKI = '188753', UAT = FALSE)
#>    Parameter Period   Type
#>       <char>  <int> <char>
#> 1:  rainfall  86400  total
#> 2:  rainfall    900  total
hydroAPI(WISKI = '188753', UAT = TRUE)
#>    Parameter Period   Type
#>       <char>  <int> <char>
#> 1:  rainfall    900  total
#> 2:  rainfall  86400  total
# Pull data
hydroAPI(WISKI = 'SX87U053',
         Parameter = 'flow',
         Period = 900,
         Type = 'instantaneous',
         datapoints = 'standard')
#>                  dateTime value   quality
#>                    <POSc> <num>    <char>
#>    1: 2023-02-15 05:15:00  1.62 Unchecked
#>    2: 2023-02-15 05:30:00  1.62 Unchecked
#>    3: 2023-02-15 05:45:00  1.62 Unchecked
#>    4: 2023-02-15 06:00:00  1.62 Unchecked
#>    5: 2023-02-15 06:15:00  1.62 Unchecked
#>   ---                                    
#> 5836: 2023-04-17 12:00:00  3.73 Unchecked
#> 5837: 2023-04-17 12:15:00  3.69 Unchecked
#> 5838: 2023-04-17 12:30:00  3.70 Unchecked
#> 5839: 2023-04-17 12:45:00  3.69 Unchecked
#> 5840: 2023-04-17 13:00:00  3.71 Unchecked

hydroAPI(WISKI = 'SX87U053',
         Parameter = 'level',
         Period = 900,
         Type = 'instantaneous',
         datapoints = 'standard',
         UAT = TRUE)
#>                    dateTime value  qcode quality
#>                      <POSc> <num> <char>  <char>
#>      1: 2004-09-29 13:15:00 0.457 Edited    Good
#>      2: 2004-09-29 13:30:00 0.457 Edited    Good
#>      3: 2004-09-29 13:45:00 0.457 Edited    Good
#>      4: 2004-09-29 14:00:00 0.458 Edited    Good
#>      5: 2004-09-29 14:15:00 0.457 Edited    Good
#>     ---                                         
#>  99996: 2007-08-07 04:00:00 0.609   <NA>    Good
#>  99997: 2007-08-07 04:15:00 0.606   <NA>    Good
#>  99998: 2007-08-07 04:30:00 0.605   <NA>    Good
#>  99999: 2007-08-07 04:45:00 0.601   <NA>    Good
#> 100000: 2007-08-07 05:00:00 0.598   <NA>    Good

hydroAPI(WISKI = '188753',
         Parameter = 'rainfall',
         Period = 86400,
         Type = 'total',
         datapoints = 'standard',
         UAT = TRUE)
#>                   dateTime value  valid invalid
#>                     <POSc> <num> <char>  <char>
#>     1: 1991-08-01 09:00:00   0.8      0       0
#>     2: 1991-08-02 09:00:00   0.0      0       0
#>     3: 1991-08-03 09:00:00   0.0      0       0
#>     4: 1991-08-04 09:00:00   0.0      0       0
#>     5: 1991-08-05 09:00:00   0.6      0       0
#>    ---                                         
#> 11569: 2023-04-10 09:00:00   4.6    100       0
#> 11570: 2023-04-11 09:00:00   3.2    100       0
#> 11571: 2023-04-12 09:00:00   1.0    100       0
#> 11572: 2023-04-13 09:00:00   0.0    100       0
#> 11573: 2023-04-14 09:00:00  13.6     97       0
